AboutPage.subtitle: I am Rodrigo Shinoda, Mid-level Fullstack Developer
AboutPage.description: Fullstack developer with 6 years of experience in Vue.js, Nuxt.js, React.js, Next.js, NodeJS, NestJS, creating robust web applications and scalable interfaces. Always updated with trends and best practices, I seek new challenges to improve my skills. I value effective communication and teamwork, believing in collaboration for exceptional results.
